articles.title: Ukrainian drones hit Russia’s Kursk region, Moscow repels attack: Governors - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Russia’s Kurchatov town target of Ukrainian drone attack as air defences stop drone’s advance on Moscow, officials say.
articles.content: A Ukrainian drone attack on the Russian town of Kurchatov in the Kursk region damaged an administrative and residential building, while a second drone was shot down near Moscow, local officials said.… [+2365 chars]
